name: Machamp

abilities.name: Strikes Back
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent's attack damages Machamp (even if Machamp is Knocked Out), this power does 10 damage to the attacking Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power can't be used if Machamp is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when your opponent attacks.

flavorText: Using its amazing muscles, it throws powerful punches that can knock its victim clear over the horizon.

strengths: Strikes Back punishes every attack against Machamp
Retaliation damage works even when knocked out
100 HP is solid for a Stage 2
weaknesses: 4 energy for Seismic Toss is expensive
Strikes Back disabled by status conditions
counters: Alakazam - Psychic weakness, Damage Swap negates Strikes Back
Mr. Mime - Blocks Seismic Toss damage

competitiveHistory: Machamp saw moderate play in the Base Set era. While Strikes Back was unique, the Psychic weakness and Stage 2 requirement limited its competitive viability compared to faster options like Hitmonchan. First Edition Machamp was included in starter decks, making it one of the more common holos.

rulings.ruling: Strikes Back damage is dealt even if Machamp is Knocked Out by the attack.
Strikes Back does not apply Weakness or Resistance.
If Machamp is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when attacked, Strikes Back does not activate.
